name: Artex Mahjong - Puzzle Game
description:
Combining outstanding levels, colorful graphics and great audio effects it is one of the most original and fun mahjong games on the Apple App Store.

Mahjong combines match three game-plays with accurate touch controls in a 3D environment.
Playing it is very simple: find and match three of identical tiles. Match all tiles to complete a board.

- 45 levels
- Beautiful 3 dimensions graphics
- Easy, normal and hard game modes
- Great soundtracks and audio effects
- Fun and addictive game-play elements

Did you finished the easy mode? Play the hard mode... It is much more challenging! ;)
